product.name: Winter Flag Rugby League Entry
product.description:
• For $35 per person you will get 2 15 minute games per week to be played EITHER Tuesday OR Thursday rotating weekly (One week may be Tuesday, one week may be Thursday). You will also get a team T-Shirt
  • Games will be at GreenTree SportsPlex from 9-10pm on Tuesdays and 9:30-10:30pm on Thursdays
  • League will start the week of 1/8 running for 4 weeks. Championship on 2/5
  • You can sign up with 3 other teammates under one team name and will then be put on a team with another 4 people to be organized by leadership to make teams as even as possible. You can also sign up as a solo and we will assign you a team
  • All teams must have at least one female player on the field at all times and 3 females per team minimum
  • All rules will be sent to the teams the starting week
  • All scheduling conflicts will be need to be coordinated internally - if you cannot make a game you will need to find a sub and/or let your team know. All games must be played with 5 players minimum - 1 being a female.
  • To get a team t-shirt you must register by 12/21
  • We are also looking for volunteer referees if you are looking for a more casual commitment and still want to be involved - T-shirt included!Â 

Please fill out this google form to complete your registration!
